body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Alcey H. Kivel Hays in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on October 1, 1827. Father to Thomas R. Hays, George W. Hays, Uriah Hays, Andrew J. Hays, Mary A. Hays, and Nancy B. Hays. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.
